amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase juvenile justice block grant funding by $74.1 million and reduce Advanced Technology Program funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 35 in the Congressional Record of September 17, 1997 to decrease funds appropriated in the bill for the Commerce Department's Advanced Technology Program and to increase funding for Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act grants programs commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 261 (Roll no. 446).
